name: Pulse
slogan: Transforming healthcare by creating remarkable experiences for doctors and patients
description:
Pulse, are the leading global provider of multichannel marketing content creation and automation and artificial intelligence technology, for life science companies.

Using our customer centric approach, combined with compelling creative and groundbreaking technology, we work with some of the worlds largest healthcare organisations to create remarkable experiences for healthcare professionals and patients.

Our CLM builder platform, Heartbeat™, is a cloud-based, multichannel marketing automation platform – optimised for Veeva customers and adopted by leading global pharmaceutical companies. Heartbeat™ seamlessly integrates into Veeva Vault and automates common tasks across the end-to-end content supply chain for CLM, Engage, Approved Email and MyInsights. 

We are at the cutting edge of transforming healthcare for the benefit of patients. We are always on the lookout for talented individuals to come and help us drive the change.

jobs.title: Backend Software Developer
jobs.description:
We are a fast growing full service agency with digital at the core of everything we do. We are dedicated to working in healthcare and partner with customers to improve the lives of patients. 

Technology is the backbone of our organisation. We pride ourselves on our expertise and the value we create for our customers. We have created and continue to run several software platforms and services for our customers/

We are looking for brilliant backend developers to join our team during this period of exiting growth. 

You will be working with an existing team developing cutting edge PHP / Laravel web based software. You should enjoy the buzz of working in a fast-paced environment. Working on some cool, challenging projects, you will have ownership over your work.

Key competencies:
Minimum two years of production PHP / Laravel.
MySQL.
Javascript / Jquery / JSON / XML / CSS / HTML.
Experience of API’s.
Experience of portable development environments (Vagrant).
Version control - GIT.
Ability to work under pressure, unsupervised and using own initiative.
Adherence to web standards, best practices and software development methodologies.

Beneficial:
Experience working on Platforms / Applications.
Experience of Angular.js / React.js / Require.js and working with RESTful API's.
Familiarity with Salesforce & Veeva
Knowledge or desire to learn other frameworks and libraries.
Knowledge of Amazon AWS.
Experience developing for pharma / life sciences / healthcare.

***No agencies please***

jobs.title: Account Executive / Junior Account Manager
jobs.description:
Our customer success team play a vital role in helping to improve patients’ lives through ideas, creativity and technology. This Account Executive / Junior Account Manager role focuses on supporting and engaging with our lovely customers and internal teams to achieve this. We are looking for genuine self-starters- those who are willing and able to pick up a project and run with it.   

Role overview
•	Be a point of contact and reference for our customers to maintain core project communications and workflow
•	Running well organised meetings with purpose, alongside timely and accurate follow-ups.
•	Administration such as meeting notes and reports.
•	Budget and Financial management.
•	Manage financial spreadsheets.
•	Create statements of work for projects
•	Produce status reports.
•	Work with a range of teams and departments, as well as with external colleagues and customers to deliver tasks or projects.
•	Taking ownership of a wide variety of tasks and deliver them.

                                                                                                           
Profile
•	Self-starter- we place a lot of emphasis on trusting you to progress projects and lead them as you see fit, with appropriate support as required. 
•	Builds relationships - Interacts well with all colleagues, suppliers and customer.
•	Drives results - Keeps commitments and is consistently reliable. Displays drive, enthusiasm and a passion for the role and its responsibilities.
•	Exhibits professional excellence - Continually monitors all personal output to ensure it is of consistently high quality, despite day-to-day pressures. Exhibits a strong sense of satisfaction in delivering tasks to the best of own ability. Respects customers and colleagues.
•	Maintains professional demeanor – presentable, shows good service, is overly helpful to customers and responds quickly.
•	Communicates effectively - Uses multiple communication channels to present information effectively given the situation (e.g. email, telephone, written work, presentations, 1:1). Able to create a range of reports, proposals and budget documentation, with support where needed. Is able to articulate ideas and is personable.
•	Basic research skills - Able to conduct desk research, i.e. to research competitor activity.
•	Numeracy - Able to understand, interpret and use numerical data.
•	Software skills - Ability to work seamlessly across multiple software tools – MS Office, Apple, G-Suite, Basecamp, Jira.
•	Strategic thinking - Stays current on business issues, trends and technological advances. Takes an active interest in the relevant industry, regularly reviews magazines, websites and industry-related information.

If you are early in your career, are ambitious, looking to learn, to push and challenge yourself, then get in touch.

***No agencies please***

jobs.title: Junior Creative Designer
jobs.description:
We are a fast growing full service agency with digital at the core of everything we do. We are dedicated to working in healthcare and partner with customers to improve the lives of patients. 

Technology is the backbone of our organisation. We pride ourselves on our expertise and the value we create for our customers. 

We are looking for a brilliant designer to join our team during this period of exiting growth. 

The **perfect candidates** will have experience across multiple digital touchpoints, creating innovative and user friendly designs. You will be motivated, eager to learn and passionate.

Experience of creating campaign assets on websites, mobile, presentations, social media and other platforms is a must.

You will have a methodical approach and be able to work independently as well as part of a team. You should have experience in Adobe Suite, Sketch, Invision and/or Photoshop.

You should be able to demonstrate a creative flair. We want someone who can both do the straight forward artworking but who can take a brief and work up creative concepts. 

**You should be**

* Has a keen eye for presentation design, layout and vector-based graphics.
* Ability to prioritise workload and meet deadlines
* Strong organisation skills
* Excellent communicator

This is a fantastic role where you will get lots of responsibility, a whole load of exposure and the opportunity to do something meaningful.
